name: Salary Man Escape
description: Tired of work? Feeling trapped at your position with no hope of promotion? Vent out your frustrations with Salary Man Escape, a satirical and edgy physics puzzle game about helping a disgruntled Salaryman escape his miserable life. Featuring PC-exclusive levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 64-bit processor and operating system 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 4340 CPU @ 3.60GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 64-bit processor and operating system 7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
